function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Movement of researchers from higher income countries to developing countries","Impact":"Dependence on international researchers may lead to minimal local engagement or capacity building","Mitigation":"Investing in local partnerships and capacity building, decolonizing research and conservation","Technologies":"Data sharing and communication technologies","People":"Local communities, conservation projects","Owner":"International organizations, local stakeholders"},{"Description":"Ineffective monitoring and intervention activities during perturbations","Impact":"Ineffective response to conservation problems or new monitoring needs","Mitigation":"Adopting monitoring and intervention activities at appropriate spatial and temporal scales","Technologies":"Monitoring technologies, real-time data analysis","People":"Conservation organizations, researchers","Owner":"Conservation organizations, research institutions"}]}
